body: You know the art is good when it looks exactly like the original did.
Wasn't that "The Neveraging Ash" was for Misty?
someone gotta do an ash x bea doujin

Oh.....man,i forgot that series of episode in that training camp....btw....double error: the pkmn that saved them is actually a Dusknoir,yet the author said Dusktops,but even Dusktop is wrong,because the name of the pre-evo is Dusclops.
As a fanatic of Dark/Ghost/Poison i can't let this slide (jk).

I legit didn't know who Angie was, but from the wiki: 

"Angie (Japanese: アオイ Aoi) is a recurring character who appeared in the Pokémon anime. She is a Pokémon caretaker at the Solaceon Town Day Care, which is owned by her parents. She first appeared in the episode Camping It Up!."
No idea who angie is but awsome doujin
